Name: Raven's Hike
About the game: ABOUT THIS GAME Help Raven reach the top of the tower, restoring equilibrium and saving the world from oblivion. Trust on your reflexes or find the safest way through every room, collect all the gems and get out. Who knows what to expect in the next trial? 60+ handcrafted open-ended levels spread through 4 stages filled with puzzles, combat with a dynamic soundtrack by Vincent Colavita.
